about.title: Interests
about.content:
In my spare time, I engage in a wide variety of challenges, from physically demanding activities to programming challenges. I enjoy running, biking, swimming, and other sports such as football. I would also consider myself a video game enjoyer.

When I am stuck at home, I won't hesitate to boot up VSCode to continue working on one of the various programming projects that I maintain. I enjoy creating apps, websites, digital art, Minecraft builds, anything that I can call my own.

about.title: Goals
about.content: I am currently furthering my knowledge in many areas both within and outside of programming. I challenge myself by studing topics such as language, physics, and computer science to better prepare myself for certain future situations.

description.short: Statalytics is a Bedwars stats bot that offers superior speed, reliability, real-time stats, visualizations, and regular updates.
description.long:
Statalytics is a Discord bot that leverages image manipulation in order to present Bedwars statistics in a well layed out manner. Statalytics uses Hypixel's API alongside it's large database of player data to perform accurate calculations as well as predictions.

Upon a user running a command, different statistics are calculated and rendered onto images before they are sent to discord for the user to view and switch between. Users are able to customize the look of the sent images through the themes feature.

description.short: Tired of missing important emails? Enotify brings them straight to your Discord DMs, where you're always active.
description.long: Tired of the email grind? Enotify cuts the cord on inbox drudgery. Enotify, your friendly robot companion, bridges the gap between Gmail and Discord. Using Google Cloud magic, Enotify listens for new emails and whispers discreet alerts on your Discord DMs, keeping you informed without the hassle.

preview.description: The #1 Discord bot for MCC Island.
